--create topic testtopic;
use test;
0 rows returned
create source test_source_1(
    col0 tinyint,
    col1 int,
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        meta("key").k0,
        v1
    )
);
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_1 no wait;
--pause 500;

-- should be no data;
select * from test_source_1 order by col0;
+--------------------+
| col0 | col1        |
+--------------------+
0 rows returned

drop source test_source_1;
0 rows returned

--delete topic testtopic;
